name: Notification of Appointment Cancellation
description: Notification sent when an existing appointment has been cancelled and removed from the scheduling system
businessPurpose: Notify auxiliary applications and systems that a previously scheduled appointment has been cancelled
timing: Sent immediately after an appointment is cancelled in the scheduling system
realWorldScenarios: Patient cancels doctor appointment due to illness
Surgery cancelled due to equipment malfunction
Provider cancels clinic due to emergency
Radiology appointment cancelled by patient request
Laboratory appointment cancelled due to fasting requirements not met
Therapy session cancelled due to provider unavailability

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - cancellation accuracy critical for resource management and patient communication
